name: Tiriyo Technologies
overview:
The Recruiter Pilot Applicant Tracking System is web-based recruiting software that streamlines the entire candidate management process, giving you instant access to all the information you need to make fast and informed recruiting and hiring decisions. Recruiter Pilot is the ultimate recruiting solution with the best talent management and resume management tools. It is the only Recruitment System where you can import resume directly from internet browser using our Candidate Radar which comes as a component with Recruiter Pilot.

Recruiter Pilot is offered as either an outsourced, hosted solution or locally deployed in both Microsoft and Unix environments. You can get your Recruiter Pilot system up and running without waiting through a lengthy installation process. Login to your system from any where in the world to gain access to your own personalized, powerful, integrated solution for recruiting employees of quality. Easy to use, quick, portable, scalable and affordable, the Recruiter Pilot puts you in control of the recruiting process, from start to finish. Point, click and place!
